name: ETHPragueConf 2025 Afterparty
short_description: Keep the ETHPragueConf energy going and join us for the official afterparty at Bike Jesus!
description:
Keep the ETHPragueConf energy going and join us for the official afterparty at Bike Jesus!

Featuring Justin Holmes Band and Band No.7 with Original Blockchain Bluegrass, Songs of Surveillance, and highly technical string band music in the spirit of the early deadhead+cypherpunk meetups. Featuring Czech musicians and a few Czech traditionals!
